control.name: icbProgressViewStyle
control.description: This combo box allows you to toggle the filling kind of the progress bar between broken and solid. Note that the progress bar has a single theme-defined style when XP themes are applied.

control.name: checkEditVertical
control.description: If checked the marquee progress bar is vertically oriented. Otherwise, it's oriented horizontally. Note that changing the progress bar's orientation usually implies changing it's bounds as well.

control.name: checkEditShowTitle
control.description: This check box toggles the visibility of the text within the marquee progress bar. The text can be specified within the 'Title' text box.

control.name: spinEditAnimationSpeed
control.description: Specifies the time period that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar

control.name: teTitle
control.description: Specifies the text that represents the progress bar's current position. This text is displayed if the 'Show Title' check box is checked.
